name: Existence
description: This is where you test demand and sell your first products or services. Focus on proving that customers care.

name: Survival
description: At this stage you cover costs and learn which parts of the business work. Tighten operations and preserve cash.

name: Success
description: Your business is profitable and known in its market. Focus on systems, customer retention and healthy margins.

name: Take-off
description: Scaling requires capital, leadership and process. Manage growth deliberately to avoid loss of quality.

name: Maturity
description: An established brand with steady revenues. Now you optimize for efficiency, diversification and long-term impact.
